unnormalised: Hey! Mental health apps, huh? I've been meaning to try one. Heard good things from my cousin, Priya, in Mumbai. Especially around Diwali, things get hectic! I feel like maybe an app could help with managing the stress. Maybe one with meditation stuff, like they teach at Isha Foundation. Could use some calm like after a spicy plate of biryani. Anyone have recommendations?
